column7: Instruction at the advanced undergraduate or graduate level in jazz percussion normally associated with the jazz idiom. Additional fees may apply. See Class Schedule. 2 to 4 undergraduate hours. 2 to 4 graduate hours. May be repeated in separate terms to a maximum of 16 undergraduate hours or 20 graduate hours. Prerequisite: Primarily for music majors, junior standing or above. Passing of an audition is required prior to initial registration in any applied music course as approved by the faculty of the appropriate applied music area. Not intended for graduate jazz percussion majors.

column11: Non-music majors will be assessed a fee.
